languages.text: {n}Ваш вкрадчивый голос словно зачаровывает псайкера. Вы прекрасно осознаете, что Идира вам верит — просто потому что хочет верить в ваши медовые речи. Верить в вас. Ведь Лорд-капитан никогда не позволит чему-то ужасному случиться со своей ручной ведьмой, верно?{/n}

{n}Your insinuating voice has her spellbound. You know that she trusts your honeyed words simply because she wants to trust them. To trust you. After all, the Lord Captain would never let something horrible happen to {mf|his|her} pet witch, would {mf|he|she}?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваш вкрадчивый голос словно зачаровывает псайкера. Вы прекрасно осознаете, что Идира вам верит — просто потому что хочет верить в ваши медовые речи. Верить в вас. Ведь Лорд-капитан никогда не позволит чему-то ужасному случиться со своей ручной ведьмой, верно?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your insinuating voice spellbinds her. You know that she trusts your honeyed words simply because she wants to trust them. Trust you. After all, the Lord Captain would never let something horrible happen to {mf|his|her} pet witch, would {mf|he|she}?{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Your insinuating voice spellbinds her. You know that she trusts your honeyed words simply because she wants to trust them. Trust you. After all, the Lord Captain would never let something horrible happen to {mf|his|her} pet witch, would {mf|he|she}?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your insinuating voice has her spellbound. You know that she trusts your honeyed words simply because she wants to trust them. To trust you. After all, the Lord Captain would never let something horrible happen to {mf|his|her} pet witch, would {mf|he|she}?{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Your insinuating voice has her spellbound. You know that she trusts your honeyed words simply because she wants to trust them. To trust you. After all, the Lord Captain would never let something horrible happen to {mf|his|her} pet witch, would {mf|he|she}?{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}你的声音仿佛带着催眠般的力量，她全都听了进去。你知道，她之所以相信你的甜言蜜语，仅仅是因为她渴望相信这些话，渴望相信你。毕竟，舰长大人绝不会让可怕的事情发生在{mf|他|她}的宠物女巫身上，不是吗？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your insinuating voice has her spellbound. You know that she trusts your honeyed words simply because she wants to trust them. To trust you. After all, the Lord Captain would never let something horrible happen to {mf|his|her} pet witch, would {mf|he|she}?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的声音仿佛带着催眠般的力量，她全都听了进去。你知道，她之所以相信你的甜言蜜语，仅仅是因为她渴望相信这些话，渴望相信你。毕竟，舰长大人绝不会让可怕的事情发生在{mf|他|她}的宠物女巫身上，不是吗？{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tu voz evocadora la tiene hechizada. Sabes que confía en tus palabras dulces solo porque quiere creer que son ciertas. Que le dices la verdad. Al fin y al cabo, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán no permitiría que le ocurriera nada a su brujita personal, ¿no?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your insinuating voice has her spellbound. You know that she trusts your honeyed words simply because she wants to trust them. To trust you. After all, the Lord Captain would never let something horrible happen to {mf|his|her} pet witch, would {mf|he|she}?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu voz evocadora la tiene hechizada. Sabes que confía en tus palabras dulces solo porque quiere creer que son ciertas. Que le dices la verdad. Al fin y al cabo, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán no permitiría que le ocurriera nada a su brujita personal, ¿no?{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Deine betörende Stimme hat sie förmlich verzaubert. Du weißt, dass sie deinen honigsüßen Worten nur deswegen vertraut, weil sie ihnen vertrauen will. Weil sie dir vertrauen will. Schließlich würde der Lord Captain doch nie zulassen, dass seiner Hexe etwas Schreckliches geschieht, oder?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your insinuating voice has her spellbound. You know that she trusts your honeyed words simply because she wants to trust them. To trust you. After all, the Lord Captain would never let something horrible happen to {mf|his|her} pet witch, would {mf|he|she}?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine betörende Stimme hat sie förmlich verzaubert. Du weißt, dass sie deinen honigsüßen Worten nur deswegen vertraut, weil sie ihnen vertrauen will. Weil sie dir vertrauen will. Schließlich würde der Lord Captain doch nie zulassen, dass seiner Hexe etwas Schreckliches geschieht, oder?{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}あなたの優しげな声は彼女を魅了する。彼女はあなたを信頼しているがゆえに、その甘い言葉も信じるのだ。あなたもそのことを知っている。結局のところ、ロード・キャプテンも自分のお気に入りの魔女が恐ろしい目に遭うことを決して許さない。そうだろう？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your insinuating voice has her spellbound. You know that she trusts your honeyed words simply because she wants to trust them. To trust you. After all, the Lord Captain would never let something horrible happen to {mf|his|her} pet witch, would {mf|he|she}?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの優しげな声は彼女を魅了する。彼女はあなたを信頼しているがゆえに、その甘い言葉も信じるのだ。あなたもそのことを知っている。結局のところ、ロード・キャプテンも自分のお気に入りの魔女が恐ろしい目に遭うことを決して許さない。そうだろう？{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Votre voix l'ensorcelle. Vous savez qu'elle a confiance en ce que vous lui dites, tout simplement par ce qu'elle veut vous croire. Elle veut vous faire confiance. Après tout, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ne laisserait rien d'horrible arriver à sa sorcière préférée, n'est-ce pas ?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your insinuating voice has her spellbound. You know that she trusts your honeyed words simply because she wants to trust them. To trust you. After all, the Lord Captain would never let something horrible happen to {mf|his|her} pet witch, would {mf|he|she}?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre voix l'ensorcelle. Vous savez qu'elle a confiance en ce que vous lui dites, tout simplement par ce qu'elle veut vous croire. Elle veut vous faire confiance. Après tout, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ne laisserait rien d'horrible arriver à sa sorcière préférée, n'est-ce pas ?
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İmalı ses tonun, İdira'yı büyülüyor. Tatlı sözlerine, onlara ve sana inanmak istediği için inandığını biliyorsun. Sonuçta Lord Kaptan, evcil cadısının başına bir şey gelmesine asla izin vermez ya.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your insinuating voice has her spellbound. You know that she trusts your honeyed words simply because she wants to trust them. To trust you. After all, the Lord Captain would never let something horrible happen to {mf|his|her} pet witch, would {mf|he|she}?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İmalı ses tonun İdira'yı büyülüyor. Tatlı sözlerine onlara ve sana inanmak istediği için inandığını biliyorsun. Sonuçta Lord Kaptan evcil cadısının başına bir şey gelmesine asla izin vermez, değil mi?{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
